text:
Following the exciting reports that Pippa Middleton gave birth to a baby boy, Kate's sister has been seen out and about with a pram for the first time.

Related Story See Pippa Middleton's Perfect Wimbledon Style

Per the Daily Mail's royal correspondent, Rebecca English, Pippa allegedly gave birth to a baby boy at approximately 1:58 p.m. London time, on October 15, 2018. While a name is yet to be announced, it was revealed that the baby boy weighed in at 8 pounds and 9 ounces.

And now, the Daily Mail is reporting that Pippa and her husband, James Matthews, have stepped out for the first time with their newborn baby. Sharing a series of photos of Pippa walking the couple's dog, while Matthews pushed their baby in a pram, the Daily Mail reports that Kate's sister was wearing a dress for the outing. Head over to the Daily Mail to see the photos of Pippa now.

As for the wild roses, ruffle wrap dress that Pippa donned for the occasion, it's :

KATE SPADE NEW YORK wild roses ruffled wrap dress KATE SPADE NEW YORK wild roses ruffled wrap dress Now 40% Off $239 at Nordstrom

Earlier this month, Pippa attended Princess Eugenie's wedding while 9 months pregnant. Arriving with her husband, Pippa wore a dark green, long-sleeved dress, with mock-turtleneck detail, which she paired with a green fascinator with bow on it.

Max Mumby/Indigo // Getty Images

Throughout her pregnancy, Pippa has written a column for magazine, in which she's discusses the different forms of exercise she's been partaking in during each trimester. In her most recent column, Pippa describes how "movement is certainly getting more awkward" as her pregnancy progresses (via People).

Related Story Pippa Middleton and James Matthews Offically Wed
title: Pippa Middleton Steps Out with Her New Baby Boy for the First Time
